item.title: Ami Miller the Killer Rap-tress - Oct 14,2011
item.description:
106 & Park is known for breaking in artist in all type of arenas. Mostly the show is know for the music video count down and live interviews, but it is also know for a segment called “Freestyle Fridays”. Every Friday different MC’s come and showcase their talent 8 mile style against a competitor to be inducted into the shows hall of fame. Most of these artist come from various sections of the east coast as that is where the heart of the art form(battle rapping) live. Houston artist however are more known for their collaborations and slowed down style of rapping. It is rare to find an artist from around here that can hold his or her own in a freestyle battle and even more rare for it to be a female. Ami Miller has obviously surpassed all of these stereotypes and went straight into the fire to show there is more to Houston artist than meets the eye. Ami Miller has made several appearances on BETs 106 and Parks Free-Style Friday and Wild Out Wednesday. Ami Miller was the first number 8 seed to defeat a 1 seed and the first female to make to the semi-finals of Free-Style Friday. Ami Miller has open for PDiddy and Dirty Money and is currently on the "Blaze The Stage" tour. During each of appearances on BET Ami was trending worldwide. Because of her style, Ami is blazing a new trail for female artist and artist in general. Ami Miller aka "Dolla Not A Dime", will take the industry by storm, nationally as well as internationally.

Ami Miller | Rap | Music | 106 and Park | BET

item.title: Rockabilly boys-and one hot girl- Cha Cha's Cadillac - Aug 12,2011
item.description:
CHA-CHAS CADILLAC has been described as a mix of Rock and Roll, Country and Punk. They have played for large audiences at The HAT FACTORY and ROCKAHOCK and Small intimate crowds at clubs, restaurants and bars and have also performed at multiple charity events. Cha-Chas Cadillac can be a family friendly band or a high energy roughty group of Rockabilly Riff-Raff. Cha-Chas Cadillac was formed in 2008 with a goal of bringing back the origins of ROCK and ROll. The name comes from Cha-Cha DiGregorio, the bad girl from "Grease". Based in Richmond, Virginia, Cha-Chas Cadillac plays all around the area bringing songs from Elvis, Chuck Berry, Buddy Holly, Johnny Cash, Hank Williams, Jerry Lee Lewis, Eddie Cochran, The Stray Cats, The Clash and many others. Cha-Chas Cadillac also has an array of original songs, available on their first Original CD entitled, "Midnight Dixie Radio. "One of the most original, unique, and fun bands that Ive seen!"-Magazine33 July issue

Music | Rockabilly | Rock | Dixie | 50s music

item.title: Lisa Lish: Pure Pleasure's Entertainer of the Year! - Jul 29,2011
item.description:
I will be chatting with my talented and fabulous friend Lisa Lish: Pure Pleasures entertainer of the year who now works with Lykens Entertainment. Check out her facebook page! https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=1316082803 Check her out! She is hot and making moves! Lisa now travels around the US doing Feature Shows and is one of the best in the US! This is sure to be an interesting and entertaining show! Tune in!

Stripper | Exotic Dancer | Feature Entertainer | Babe | Exotic Dancing
